languages.text: "Так у Космических волков зовется отец стаи. Я — опытный воин, и мне отдает приказы эттфатер. Он подчиняется ярлу — командиру великой роты. Раз сейчас мной командуешь ты, и командуешь достойно, я дарую тебе привилегию зваться моим эттфатером".

"This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "Так у Космических волков зовется отец стаи. Я — опытный воин, и мне отдает приказы эттфатер. Он подчиняется ярлу — командиру великой роты. Раз сейчас мной командуешь ты, и командуешь достойно, я дарую тебе привилегию зваться моим эттфатером".

traits.locale_text: "This is the name given by Space Wolves to the leader of a pack. I am a Huscarl, a seasoned warrior, and I take orders from a Thegin. He answers to a Jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands me at present, and you do so with honour, I am granting you the privilege of calling yourself my Thegin."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is the name given by Space Wolves to the leader of a pack. I am a Huscarl, a seasoned warrior, and I take orders from a Thegin. He answers to a Jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands me at present, and you do so with honour, I am granting you the privilege of calling yourself my Thegin."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is the name given by Space Wolves to the leader of a pack. I am a Huscarl, a seasoned warrior, and I take orders from a Thegin. He answers to a Jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands me at present, and you do so with honour, I am granting you the privilege of calling yourself my Thegin."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Es el nombre que los Lobos Espaciales damos al padre de una jauría. Un comandante o capitán. El aett-vater, a su vez, recibe órdenes de un jarl, que dirige una Gran Compañía. Puesto que usted es quien dirige a su gente y puesto que estoy siguiendo sus órdenes, le concedo el honorable título de Aett-Vater».
languages.original_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: «Es el nombre que los Lobos Espaciales damos al jefe de una jauría. Soy un guerrero veterano y recibo mis órdenes de un aett-vater, que a su vez recibe órdenes de un jarl, que dirige una Gran Compañía. Puesto que usted es quien dirige mis acciones y puesto que lo hace con honor, le concedo el privilegio de llamarse mi aett-vater».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “这是芬里斯人对狼群首领的称呼，类似于指挥官。狼领则听命于领主，也就是大型连队的指挥官。既然你在船上是指挥官，我目前又与你同行，我在此授予你特权，允许你成为我的狼领。”
languages.original_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: “这是太空野狼对狼群首领的称呼。我是经验丰富的战士，听命于狼领，而狼领则听命于大型连队的指挥官，也就是领主。既然你是我的指挥官，而且你的所作所为十分光荣，我自然会授予特权，允许你成为我的狼领。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「これはフェンリスで群れの長に与えられる名前。司令か隊長に当たるな。アエット＝ヴァテルはヤール…群狼団の司令に匹敵する。あんたはクルーを指揮して、俺は今あんたに従ってる。アエット＝ヴァテルの名誉ある称号をやるよ」
languages.original_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: 「これはフェンリスで群れの長に与えられる名前。司令か隊長に当たるな。アエット＝ヴァテルはヤール…群狼団の司令に匹敵する。あんたはクルーを指揮して、俺は今あんたに従ってる。アエット＝ヴァテルの名誉ある称号をやるよ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « C'est ainsi que l'on désigne un chef de meute sur Fenris. L'aett-vater est l'équivalent d'un capitaine, lui-même subordonné à un jarl, le commandant d'une Grande Compagnie. Puisque c'est vous qui assurez le commandement de votre équipage et que je suis actuellement sous vos ordres, je vous accorde le privilège de vous appeler par ce titre. »
languages.original_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ainsi que les Space Wolves désignent leur chef de meute. En tant que guerrier chevronné, je suis placé sous l'autorité directe d'un aett-vater, lui même subordonné à un jarl, le commandant d'une Grande Compagnie. Puisque c'est vous qui assurez le commandement actuellement, et que vous le faites avec honneur, je vous accorde le privilège de vous appeler par ce titre. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Das ist der Name, den auf Fenris ein Rudelvater erhält. Ein Commander oder Captain. Ein Aett-Vater untersteht einem Jarl – dem Commander einer Großkompanie. Da Ihr im Augenblick Eure Crew befehligt und ich Euch folge, gewähre ich Euch den ehrenvollen Titel Aett-Vater."
languages.original_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: "So nennen Space Wolves dem Anführer eines Rudels. Ich bin ein erfahrener Krieger, und ich nehme Befehle von einem Aett-Vater entgegen. Er untersteht einem Jarl — dem Kommandanten einer Großkompanie. Da Ihr mich im Augenblick befehligt, und dies ehrenhaft tut, gewähre ich Euch das Privileg, Euch meinen Aett-Vater zu nennen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."

languages.text: "Fenris'te sürü babalarına öyle deriz. Komutan veya kaptan gibi bir anlamı vardır. Aett-vater, yarl'a bağlıdır. Yarl da Büyük Bölük komutanıdır. Tayfanı komuta eden kişi olduğun ve şu anda senin sözün geçtiği için sana şanlı Aett-Vater ünvanını verdim."
languages.original_text: "This is the name given on Fenris to a pack-father. A commander or captain. An aett-vater answers to a jarl — the commander of a Great Company. Since you are the one who commands your crew and I follow you at present, I am granting you the honoured title of Aett-Vater."

traits.locale_text: "Fenris'te sürü babalarına öyle deriz. Komutan veya kaptan gibi bir anlamı vardır. Aett-vater, Büyük Bölük komutanı jarl'a bağlıdır. Tayfanı komuta eden kişi olduğun ve şu anda senin sözün geçtiği için sana şanlı Aett-Vater ünvanını verdim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
